top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!

Before you even mentioned the attachment for the slow close rails I was thinking "man, push-to-open drawers would be slick". 

That gets my vote.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I am a cabinet maker and I can teller you from experience push to open is a nightmare to get right, half the time the mechanism doesn't even respond and you have to push 2 or 3 times to get it to open and the other half of the time it is overly sensitive and opens from just a light brush smacking you in the legs (or worse) while you are working on the bench top.
